title: Bad Bush
text:
Bad Bush is a 2009 Australian <a href="Thriller%20%28genre%29">psychological thriller</a> film. Starring <a href="Chris%20Sadrinna">Chris Sadrinna</a> from television soap "<a href="Home%20and%20Away">Home and Away</a>" and <a href="Jeremy%20Lindsay%20Taylor">Jeremy Lindsay Taylor</a> from "<a href="Sea%20Patrol%20%28TV%20series%29">Sea Patrol</a>" and featuring <a href="Viva%20Bianca">Viva Bianca</a> from "" in her debut feature film, the film is based on the real-life story centred on a young woman with her baby alone with a crazed man on a property.
The film was mostly made at <a href="Mangrove%20Mountain">Mangrove Mountain</a> and <a href="Somersby%2C%20New%20South%20Wales">Somersby</a> on the Central Coast, New South Wales. Appropximately 100 students from The Entrance High School worked on the film behind the scenes. "Bad Bush" premièred at the Avoca Beach Picture Theatre on 7 May 2009.
Box office.
"Bad Bush" grossed $8,961 at the box office in Australia.
